definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ne 2:6 walk, journey, going (late); cstr. [[מַהֲלַח]] Ez Eze 42:4 + 2 t.; sf. [[מַהֲלָֽכְךָ]] Ne 2:6; pl. [[מַהְלְכִים]] Zec 3:7; —
walk ‘of 10 cubits’ breadth before the chambers' in Ezekiel's temple Ez Eze 42:4 (cf. Da).

journey fr. Bab. to Jerusalem Ne 2:6; of dimension of Nineveh, a journey of three days Jon 3:3 i.e. diameter or length, cf. v:Jon 3:4; (acc. to Herodot:v. 58 one day's journey = 150 stadia, = length of Nineveh acc. to Diod:ii. 3).
pl. goings, i.e. free access (VB) Zec 3:7.
